metadata.name: Kura
metadata.description:
The beautiful and curious spirit Kura (expressed as the koi fish) is endangered and alone until a goddess finds her. As she struggles to swim towards her, the goddess can't help but cry. Reciting a lullaby, the goddess gently lulls Kura into a water bottle to take her home with her. Every sunrise in her new home, she jumps out of the water in a joy to see her goddess, still curious and beautiful and now safe and loved.

Made April 4th to May 4th 2023 using Procreate Pocket and Affinity Photo. Some photos of it being made https://arweave.net/c_sQjs7mHYz6ygZQXEfCKR8yNJXjF5CxkfuGOvp_Khk

This is one of two, one for me and one for sale, some parts may be added as small details in future tokens.

3200 x 3200 pixels
